scripts.dev: concurrently --names cljs,css -c blue,magenta "npx shadow-cljs watch app" "npx postcss src/css/app.css -o resources/public/css/app.css --watch"
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p resources/public/css/vendor && cp node_modules/@blueprintjs/core/lib/css/blueprint.css resources/public/css/vendor/ && cp node_modules/@blueprintjs/icons/lib/css/blueprint-icons.css node_modules/@blueprintjs/icons/lib/css/blueprint-icons-16.* node_modules/@blueprintjs/icons/lib/css/blueprint-icons-20.* resources/public/css/vendor/
